alert.note: Alert for Billings; Dunn; Golden Valley; McLean; Mercer; Morton; Oliver (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 1:38PM CST until December 23 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST/5 AM MST/ FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST/11 AM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing and drifting snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of western and central North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST/5 AM MST/ Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, until Noon CST/11 AM MST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Avoid outdoor activities as much as possible. When outside, be sure to wear appropriate winter apparel. Make frequent checks on older family, friends, and neighbors.

area.areaDesc: Billings; Dunn; Golden Valley; McLean; Mercer; Morton; Oliver
